text: Rodney Terry Latham (born 12 June 1961 in Christchurch) is a New Zealand former cricketer. He played four test matches and 33 one-day internationals for New Zealand from 1990 to 1994. He also played for Canterbury in the Plunket Shield and rugby for Canterbury. He is the father of New Zealand cricketer Tom Latham. ==Other websites== * from Cricinfo Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Rod Latham
